title.jp: Hajimete no Jumon wa Amai Wana / Gogo no Jumon wa Akai Cub

synopsis:
A. Dr. K-Ko has devised traps that ends up trapping Pachira, Liru, and Aiko. Thus, Uma ends up coming to the rescue.
B. Upon learning about mail, Uma tries to build a mailbox so that the girls can receive mail.

title.jp: The Spell of the Moon is a Blood Pedigree / The Make-Believe Spell is TV Shopping

synopsis:
A. Following an incident at the prehistoric mammal section of the museum, Liru discovers love when she meets a man named Ryo who turns out to be another werewolf.
B. While watching TV, Uma learns about home shopping when she sees an Electric Trainer (a type of fitness belt) on TV. Soon, the other girls get interested until they learn that home shopping includes having to pay for the stuff.

title.jp: Tomorrow`s Spell is a Blood Donation of Love / The Spell of Happiness is an Ideal Man

synopsis:
A. When encountering a cute guy outside of a Blood Donation Bus, Pachira ends up donating some of her blood and ends up weak.
B. While in a movie theatre, the girls discuss their dream boyfriend.

title.jp: The Secret Spell is A Storm Front / The Spell of Relativity is Tanabata, the Star Festival

synopsis:
A. During the rainy season, Aiko's systems are dirty. With Liru occupied with the rain, Uma and Pachira try to clean Aiko's systems.
B. A heat wave has struck the city and the girls learn that Tanabata occurs on the 7th of July while deciding what wish should be granted by it.

title.jp: A Tiring Spell Is a Trip to the Beach / Love`s Spell Is a Trip to the Beach

synopsis:
A. When a typhoon ruins their day at the beach, the girls try to improvise at the nearest hotel.
B. Following an accident with their floats, the girls are saved from drowning by Lulu, the princess of the merfolk.

title.jp: The Spell of Rebirth Is a Search Through Hell / A Healing Spell is a Park Debut

synopsis:
A. Uma suddenly ends up in different parts of Hell.
B. Uma ends up performing magic tricks in the park to entertain people.

title.jp: A Richly-Flavored Spell Is the Night of the Full Moon / A Combining Spell Is the Invincible Robot, M5!

synopsis:
A. Liru prepares for the viewing of the Full Moon.
B. In this Super Robot-type segment, Uma, Pachira, Liru, and Keimie act out as Magical 5 to save Aiko and their fuel company from a giant Mecha-Hongo robot created by Dr. K-Ko.

title.jp: Tonight`s Spell is a Vampire / The Spell of Dreams is Magic that Lasts only one Day

synopsis:
A. People are being attacked by a vampire and Liru suspects Pachira for the attacks. Pachira suspects that someone else is behind these attacks.
B. Aiko orders Happy Chalk which can bring anything that's drawn to life. Since it can only work for a witch, Uma uses it to draw various things including drawing up a galactic train to take them to the Andromeda Galaxy.

title.jp: The Spell of Breaching is Inviting a Love Interest Home / The White Spell is Christmas

synopsis:
A. While out getting Ishiyakiimo (yams baked on hot stones), Liru ends up saving a guy from being beaten up. She then ends up in the excitement that turns her into her werewolf form. When Aiko invites him to their house, Liru doesn't want to be seen in her current form.
B. The girls prepare for Christmas ranging from Aiko making a metal stocking and the girls solving their chimney problem.

title.jp: A Cold Spell is Snowboarding and Skiing / A Hot Spell is a Natural Hot Spring

synopsis:
A. The girls hit the slopes and learn how to ski. When they fail to make a reservation at one of the lodges, they end up staying with some snow people.
B. The girls find a hot spring and end up encountering women who turn out to be Tanukis that end up stealing their clothes.

title.jp: The Spell of Reticence is Having Fun with English Conversation / A Pinch Spell is the Other Side of

synopsis:
A. The girls play a "speaking English" game hosted by Keimie and a mess-up has them drinking the bad-tasting Natto drink.
B. The girls see Dr. K-Ko on a TV show revolving on the theory of horror movie monsters existing amongst the human race. When the co-host of the TV show ends up discovering the girl's secret thanks to footage used by Dr. K-Ko, it is then made public as they soon end up on a discussion show against Dr. K-Ko in the discussion if monsters from the Netherworld are dangerous.

title.jp: A Sorrowful Spell is When One Is Transformed by Memories / A Kind Spell is a Magician

synopsis:
A. Aiko finds a VCR that contains her memories as a rerun of the girls' favorite show is airing. When they plan to use the VCR to tape it, they end up needing D/A Converter to hook it up to their Digital Television.
B. When Uma ends up with an infection, she ends up getting the other girls infected with her magic. With her magic perfected, she practices it on the town. After curing herself and the other girls of their infection, they soon work on a spell to make a Cherry Blossom Tree bloom early.
